question:
Which of the following are involved in the election of the members of the legislative council of state?
1. Members of local bodies in the state like municipalities, district boards etc.
2. Graduates of three years standing and residing within the state.
3. Members of the legislative assembly of the state.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The following are involved in the election of the members of state legislative council : (1) Members of local bodies in the state like municipalities, district boards etc, (2) Graduates of three years standing and residing within the state, (3) Members of the legislative assembly of the state, (4) Teachers of three years standing in the state, not lower in standard than secondary school, (5) Remainder are nominated by the governor.
